gofumpt -w foo.go .
cmp foo.go foo.go.golden

-- foo.go --
// +build tag

package p

//go:generate some command

//go:unknowndirective

//line 123

//foo is foo.
type foo int

//	comment with a tab.

//  comment with many spaces

//comment group
//123 numbers too

////////////
// ascii art
//----------

//
-- foo.go.golden --
// +build tag

package p

//go:generate some command

//go:unknowndirective

//line 123

// foo is foo.
type foo int

//	comment with a tab.

//  comment with many spaces

// comment group
// 123 numbers too

////////////
// ascii art
//----------

//
